physical_appearance:The image shows a set of garment. All of them are pink in colour except for one that is in red. The garment on the right hand side is shaped as a quadrant. It has floral designs on one of its sides. There is an image of a cross on the garment as well. The red garment on the left hand side is shaped as a square. The rest of the garments are rectangular in shape.
